name: BLACKLIGHT (Version 0.1)
description:
Erik and Sofia are twins born aboard the Second International Space Station, a sprawling network of laboratories, living quarters, and ventilation shafts. When an explosion rocks the station, Erik and Sofia awaken to fantastic new powers - and strange alien foes.

Switch between Erik and Sofia on the fly, wielding the powers of the sun and moon. Find new abilities, upgrades, and machine parts as you explore the station for survivors. 

This is the February 14, 2023 "first draft" version of BLACKLIGHT. As such, many features that will be included in the upcoming Scholar's Day "final draft" version are missing, such as the Greenhouse boss battle and following cutscene. 

IMPORTANT NOTE: There is no save feature in this game. When you close the game, you will lose all progress. Additionally, you must use your computer's Task Manager to end the BLACKLIGHT application, as there is no in-game quitting function yet.
